Additionally, silicone pads on the extension section provide ample friction, guaranteeing stability for the cup holder extender and achieving a balanced, secure installation.

Wide Compatibility: Our removable car cup holder tray is compatible with most car models on the market, and the tray extender is easy to install. No need to remove the original parts or use additional tools. It can be easily removed when not in use. The non-destructive design does not interfere with driving while keeping the car interior neat and tidy, balancing compatibility and practicality.

Excellent Quality Guarantee: JPart is committed to providing high-quality and convenient car cup holder trays. We offer a double after-sales guarantee—including a one-year free replacement service and a six-month warranty. If you have any questions or concerns about this car cup holder tray, please feel free to contact us.

Use the triangle toggle button on the cup holder expander rack to adjust its size according to your cup, and you're good to go.

Versatile Compatibility: Our upgraded cup holder expander for the car is designed to accommodate a wide range of drinks, bottles, and mugs. It is compatible with various sizes, including popular brands like Yeti Rambler (14-50oz), Hydro Flasks (18-64oz), and most coffee mugs. Whether you have a 12 oz or a 64 oz container, our cup holder adapter can securely hold them in place.

Stable and Adjustable Design: The expansion base legs of our car cup holder mount stay firmly in place, providing stability during travel. It can be conveniently used in different vehicles, such as motorcycles, boats, trucks, trailers, and golf carts, as long as they have cylindrical cup holders. The adjustable blade securely holds bottles and cups with diameters ranging from 2.6" to 4.8".

name: [Upgraded] Integral Ultimate Car Cup Holder Expander - Adjustable Base - Organizer & Expander for Vehicles - Compatible with Mugs, Yeti 14/24/36/46oz, Rambler, Hydro Flasks 32/40oz, 3.4"-4.0" Bottles
short_description: Upgraded Version
Offset and Height Adjustable
Simple Installation and Universal Fit

A CUP HOLDER FOR BOTTLES & MUGS THAT WON'T FIT: The Ultimate Expander installs into your vehicle’s cup holder in seconds and holds your water bottle, thermos, or mug in a firm, snug fit. Travel with your version of YETI, RTIC, Milwaukee, Nalgene, Hydro Flask, CamelBak, and more. Holds any bottles or mugs from 3.4" - 4.0" in diameter.

OFFSET AND HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE: Offset the base from the expander to keep the adjacent cup holder open. This also allows two Ultimate Expanders to fit next to each other in most dual cup holder applications. Recessed or covered cup holders? No problem! We also include two spacers that can increase the height by 1" each. Between the height and offset adjustability there isn't a vehicle the Ultimate Expander will not work in. Compatible with RAV4, Subaru, Volvo, and more.

STAYS FIRMLY IN PLACE: We have the only expandable base with built-in, silicon grips. Others use cheap, glued-on grips that immediately fail in any hot vehicle. Once these fail, the product is useless. Enjoying a bit of rough terrain? An adjustable base is the only way to keep an expander and oversized bottle firmly in place. The Ultimate Expander features a 3-ring expandable base with a diameter range of 2.5”-3.75” to keep it firmly in place, regardless of terrain type.

DRINK FROM YOUR FAVORITE MUG: The Ultimate Expander features an integrated mug handle slot so your favorite mug fits in with ease. Fit your 14oz YETI Rambler, 24oz YETI Rambler, most standard household coffee mugs, and many more.

SIMPLE INSTALLATION & A UNIVERSAL FIT: It couldn’t be easier! 2 steps & 5 seconds is all it takes to fit your car’s cup holder with the universal fitting Ultimate Expander. Simply hold the base and twist the top. The base will retract or expand to custom fit your cup holder. No tools, no hardware, no problem. Every vehicle should come with one of these! Did we mention it makes an excellent gift?

LOVE IT OR ITS ON US: Our goal is to ensure your 100% satisfaction. Because our time and energy are finite, we don’t want to waste it fussing around with products that don’t live up to their promise, and we don’t want you to either. So if you’re not totally satisfied with the quality and function of the Ultimate Expander, we’ll make it right—no questions asked.
